first_para: Jonathan William Arnott (born 12 January 1981) is a Member of the European Parliament for the North East England region for the United Kingdom Independence Party. He was elected in 2014.

full.extract: Jonathan William Arnott (born 12 January 1981) is a Member of the European Parliament for the North East England region for the United Kingdom Independence Party. He was elected in 2014.
full.title: Jonathan Arnott
